thread.section_title: Peking International Youth Hostel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location and rooms.
thread.title_full: Excellent location and rooms. - Review of Peking International Youth Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: tpisg
title: Excellent location and rooms.
text:
Stayed here for 4 nights and it is very close to Beijing's subway which is one of the best ways to go around this huge city. Rooms are quite big and very very clean. Since it is located at Nanluoguxiang, do expect tourists (both local and foreign) to flood the streets. We however could not hear any street noises from our room so that was fine. The NLGX street is laden with plenty of shops and prices are pretty fair for most stuff.
Room Tip: Twin rooms seems to be on level 1 next to the common area. Double rooms are on level 2. :) See more room tips
